com.milk.uberchat.irc
Interface ReplyTap

interface ReplyTap

This interface is to be implemented by the taps that are added to snarf away ServerReply messages.

Author:
Dan Bornstein, danfuzz@milk.com
, Copyright 1999 Dan Bornstein, all rights reserved.

          Handle the given reply message.
 

Method Detail

handleReply

public boolean handleReply(ServerReply reply)
Handle the given reply message.

Parameters:
reply - the reply message
Returns:
true if the tap is done with its tapping
